        public void printChatMessageWithOptionalDeletion(IChatComponent chatComponent,
                                                 int chatLineId)
        prints the ChatComponent to Chat. If the ID is not 0, deletes an existing Chat Line of that ID from the GUI
        Parameters:
        chatComponent - The chat component to display
        chatLineId - The chat line id
